definition[0]: if an animal or plant evolves, it changes gradually over a long period of time
example[0]: Animals have evolved camouflage to protect themselves from predators.
example[1]: Fish evolved from prehistoric sea creatures.
definition[1]: to develop and change gradually over a long period of time
example[2]: The school has evolved its own style of teaching.
example[4]: The idea evolved out of work done by British scientists.
example[5]: The group gradually evolved into a political party.
